articles.author: NICOLE WINFIELD
articles.title: Vatican blasts sex change surgery, surrogacy and gender theory - The Associated Press
articles.description: The Vatican has declared that gender-affirming surgeries and surrogacy are grave violations of human dignity. A new document from the doctrine office puts them on par with abortion and euthanasia as practices that violate God’s plan for human life. In its mos…
articles.content: VATICAN CITY (AP) The Vatican on Monday declared gender-affirming surgery and surrogacy as grave violations of human dignity, putting them on par with abortion and euthanasia as practices that reject… [+7195 chars]
